Plot: Feeling pressured to become more sexually experienced before she goes to college, Brandy Klark makes a list of things to accomplish before hitting campus in the fall.
Title: The To Do List
Actors: Aubrey Plaza, Johnny Simmons, Bill Hader, Alia Shawkat
tomatoConsensus: The To Do List may play things disappointingly safe given its rather daring premise, but writer-director Maggie Carey's sure hand -- and Aubrey Plaza's performance -- keep the laughs coming.
